name: Jessica Lin
persona: Jessica Lin is a 20-year-old Psychology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.23. She is motivated to achieve good grades and generally believes in her academic abilities, though she sometimes struggles with consistency in her study habits. Jessica puts in steady effort and is able to persevere through challenges, but occasionally experiences moderate test anxiety. She is organized and diligent, always aiming to improve her performance each semester.
